summary: The Hollywood Walk of Fame is a famous landmark in Los Angeles, California. It's a sidewalk with 2,800 stars honoring people in the entertainment industry. These stars are made of terrazzo and brass and can be found along Hollywood Boulevard and Vine Street. The first stars were added in 1960. The Hollywood Chamber of Commerce looks after the Walk of Fame, and celebrities or their sponsors pay to have a star added. It's a popular tourist spot, attracting around 10 million visitors each year.
title: Hollywood Walk of Fame
